TEXT.WELCOME: Welcome to Cibaria, your ultimate destination for discovering, sharing, and engaging with recipes from around the world. At Cibaria, we believe food brings people together, and our platform is designed to celebrate the joy of cooking and the magic of flavors.
TEXT.EXPLORE: Here, you can explore a treasure trove of recipes, crafted by passionate home cooks and seasoned chefs alike. Whether you’re looking for inspiration for a family dinner, experimenting with a new cuisine, or perfecting a cherished classic, Cibaria is your trusted companion in the kitchen.
TEXT.COMMUNITY: But we’re more than just a recipe repository. Cibaria thrives on community. Add your own recipes to showcase your culinary creativity, rate dishes to guide fellow food lovers, and share comments to exchange tips, tweaks, and praise. Every rating and comment contributes to making Cibaria a dynamic and collaborative space where everyone’s voice and taste matter.
TEXT.JOIN: Join us on this flavorful journey, and let’s cook, share, and savor together. Welcome to Cibaria – where every dish tells a story!

MAINPAGE.TITLE: Turning ideas into unforgettable culinary experiences
MAINPAGE.SUBTITLE: Transform your culinary visions into delectable creations with effortless finesse and a touch of sophistication. Let every idea come to life as a memorable dish, served with grace and enjoyed one bite at a time.

FEATURE.SUBTITLE1: Discover recipes that will delight your loved ones, no matter the occasion. From quick weeknight meals to special celebrations, bring creativity and joy to your kitchen with dishes that everyone will love.
FEATURE.SUBTITLE2: Take full control of your cooking schedule and adapt it to your daily life. Whether you prefer to plan meals weeks in advance or decide on the fly, you can organize your cooking effortlessly and always stay on top of your culinary goals.
FEATURE.SUBTITLE3: By preparing meals yourself, you have full control over the ingredients and flavors that go into every dish. Enjoy the peace of mind that comes with knowing exactly what you're eating – fresh, healthy, and perfectly tailored to your taste.

COLLECT.TITLE: What Information We Collect
COLLECT.USAGE: Usage data: saved recipe history, favorite lists, comments, and ratings.
COLLECT.DEVICE: Device information: browser type, IP address.

USE.TITLE: How We Use Your Information
USE.SERVICE: Provide and improve our services, such as organizing recipes and tailoring features.
USE.PERSONALIZE: Personalize your experience, including recommending recipes based on your preferences.
USE.COMMUNICATE: Communicate about your account, including updates and notifications.
USE.ANALYZE: Analyze usage patterns on our platform to improve its functionality.

SHARE.TITLE: Sharing Information
SHARE.TEXT: We do not sell your personal data. However, we may share information:
SHARE.PROVIDERS: With service providers supporting the operation of Cibaria, such as hosting and analytics.
SHARE.LAW: With law enforcement if required by law.

SECURITY.TITLE: Data Security
SECURITY.TEXT: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your data. However, as a passion-driven project, we cannot guarantee complete security.

RIGHTS.TITLE: Your Rights
RIGHTS.ACCESS: Access your personal data stored on our platform.
RIGHTS.DELETE: Request the deletion of your account along with saved data.
RIGHTS.OPT_OUT: Opt out of receiving promotional communications.

USER_CONTENT.TEXT: Cibaria allows users to create, save, and share recipe-related content. By submitting content, you agree to the following:

STEPS.LICENSE: You grant Cibaria a non-exclusive, royalty-free, worldwide license to display, modify, and distribute your content within the platform for purposes related to its operation.
STEPS.RESTRICTIONS: You will not upload content that is offensive, inappropriate, or violates any laws or third-party rights.

STEPS.ILLEGAL_USE: Use the platform for illegal purposes or activities.
STEPS.INTERFERENCE: Interfere with the functioning of the platform, such as by introducing malware or engaging in data scraping.
STEPS.HARASSMENT: Harass, abuse, or harm other users.

TERMINATION.TEXT: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account if you violate these Terms of Service or engage in activities that harm Cibaria or its users.

CHANGES.TEXT: We may update these Terms of Service at any time. Significant changes will be communicated to you via the platform or email. Continued use of the platform constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.
